mapper.sql:
from item_exchange a
JOIN user_user b ON (a.ownerId = b.userId OR a.changerId = b.userId) AND b.mobile = #{mobile}
where 1=1
and a.exchangeFinishStatus='wait'
and a.exchangeFinishStatus !='wait'
mapper.select:
select a.*
order by exchangeId desc
mapper.update:
update item_exchange
exchangeFinishTime=now(), exchangeTime=now(), exchangeState='exchanged',
exchangeFinishStatus='yes',
exchangeFinishStatus='no',
where exchangeId = #{exchangeId}
update item_exchange set exchangeState = 'cancel' where ownerId = #{userId} and exchangeState = 'exchanging'
